arts.ttl: Messi shows why he's the GOAT with this stunning goal against Atlanta United
arts.sum: Just minutes after Atlanta's early strike, Lionel Messi showcased why he's regarded as one of the greatest of all time with an incredible goal to equalize for Inter Miami . Inter Miami's hopes of securing the top spot in the MLS Eastern Conference were on the line, and Messi's contribution couldn't have come at a more crucial moment.

arts.ttl: Lionel Messi, Fafà Picault rally Inter Miami to 2-1 victory over Atlanta United
arts.sum: Brooks Lennon made his 200th career start and first this season and immediately had an impact in the 11th minute when he sent a crossing pass to Emmanuel Latte Lath, who sent a header past former Atlanta United goalkeeper Rocco Ríos Novo. Lionel Messi scored early and Fafà Picault scored the winner after subbing in late to rally Inter Miami to a 2-1 victory over Atlanta United at Mercedes-Benz Stadium on Sunday night.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami 2–1 Atlanta United: Player Ratings as Messi, Picault Put Miami Atop Eastern Conference
arts.sum: Fafá Picault scored a late winning goal as Inter Miami CF defeated their Southern U.S. foes.

arts.ttl: Sunday's Major League Soccer predictions including Atlanta United vs. Inter Miami
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Major League Soccer fixtures, including Atlanta United vs. Inter Miami.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami vs. Atlanta United: Predicted Lineups in MLS Cup Playoffs Rematch
arts.sum: Lionel Messi is expected to return to MLS play against Atlanta United on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Will Lionel Messi Play as Inter Miami Look for Revenge vs. Atlanta United?
arts.sum: After missing two MLS matches, Lionel Messi is looks set to return to face Atlanta United.
